name: CredKin
description: InstaKin's purpose-driven remittance model is reimagining the future of FinTech for migrant families. The team, led by Yasir Shirazi has developed a best-in-class remittance product that grants access to funds for families across diasporas in a safe & convenient manner while providing significant rewards. Instakin achieved 20K users in 2021 and reached $1.2m in GMV. The company is backed by Antler, Y Combinator, Magic Fund, and several strategic angels.
